mapper.insert: insert into musics(artistId, videoId, title, musicTime ,musicImageUri) values(#{artistId}, #{videoId}, #{title}, #{musicTime}, #{musicImageUri})
insert into lyrics(musicId, lyric, meaning, startOffsetMs, durationMs, lyricAudioUri) values(#{musicId}, #{lyric}, #{meaning}, #{startOffsetMs}, #{durationMs}, #{lyricAudioUri})
mapper.update: update lyrics set lyricAudioUri = concat("/study/music/lyric/audio/",last_insert_id(),".jpg") where lyricId = last_insert_id()
